Reference

All functions

add_hpo_id()

Add HPO term ID column to dataframe

adjacency_matrix()

Adjacency matrix

get_gene_list()

Get gene list

get_hpo()

Get Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)

get_hpo_id()

Get HPO ID from phenotype name

get_hpo_id_direct()

Get HPO term ID direct

get_ont_level()

Get HPO term ontology level

get_relative_ont_level()

Get relative ont level (for terms in a connected component of HPO subset)

get_relative_ont_level_multiple()

Get relative ontology level for multiple HPO terms

get_term_definition()

Get term definition

ggnetwork_plot()

Generate network plot

hpo_meta

Human Phenotype Ontology: metadata

hpo_tiers

Human Phenotype Ontology: disease severity tiers

load_phenotype_to_genes()

Load phenotype_to_genes.txt

make_hoverboxes()

Make hoverboxes

make_network_object()

Make network object

make_phenos_dataframe()

Make phenotypes dataframe

newlines_to_definition()

Add new lines to disease description

per_branch_plot()

Plot N phenotypes per branch
